text: I am skilled in working with databases such as SQL Server and MySQL, ensuring data integrity and optimizing performance. I am also proficient in version control tools like Git and GitHub, which allow me to facilitate smooth collaboration and manage projects efficiently. Additionally, I excel in problem-solving and debugging, consistently identifying issues and implementing effective, long-term solutions.

As a full-stack developer, I have developed a diverse set of skills in both front-end and back-end development. My expertise includes several programming languages, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, C#, SQL, and Python, allowing me to efficiently create and maintain both client-side and server-side code. I am also experienced in frameworks and libraries like React and Node.js, which I use to build responsive, dynamic web applications.
